scripts.start: cd electron && npm i && npm start
scripts.bench: cd electron && npm i && npm run bench
scripts.build: npm i && napi build --platform --release && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:debug: npm i && napi build --platform --js && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:ts: tsc -p tsconfig.json && prettier --write . && npm run rollup
scripts.generate:schema: flatdata-generator -s schema/osm.flatdata -g rust -O src/generated/osmflat_generated.rs && flatc --rust -o src/generated/ schema/*.fbs & flatc --ts -o src/typescript/fbs/ schema/*.fbs && npm run format && cargo fmt
scripts.clean: rm -rf index* node_modules package-lock.json dist/* && cargo clean
scripts.t: npm run build && npm run test
